> Dark One activated his weapons systems, making a strafing run, firing down
25
> rapid laser bolts at Rizopas.

"Bring it on" Rizopas says as he is struck, hsi rage building as he wants to
battle. he fires in a rapid ark 25 times at Dark One.

> Breakdown fired off another shell at Blender.

Blender jumps to the side, hitting his head and avoiding the shell.

"You only weapon?" Blender asks. He fires his forearm saw, it is replaced by
another. The saw heads for Breakdown, homing in on him and spinning deadly.

> Pyro ducked, the missile dragging flames into Pyro's face.  But the
> pyromaniac didn't care, flames were his friends!  Transforming to his
black
> tank mode, he fired off two fire balls at Rizopas.

Rizopas is hit on the back and knocked forward. He gets up off the ground.

"Oh, a cheap shot, how courageous." Rizopas spins around and fires 4 times
at Pyro. Stronghold moved through the falmes, and leapt forward swinging a
fist at Pyro's head.

> Hiss fired off three fusion blasts at Stronghold's chest.

Stronghold is struck. Some wires were exposed in his chest.

"You should give up, it would hurt less." Stronghold returns fire in the
form of a missile from his back at Hiss.

> Demon Wulf ignored damage from the autoguns.  He pointed his sword at the
> base, the blade blasting off, now a missile, heading for the base, the
blade
> quickly replaced.

Base damage: The base tapped into an alternate power source, this one was
for emergencies. The base didn't take much damage, their shields came back
on, but the autoguns were nothing but 2 big ones. The big ones fired at the
Alliance...

> Serpentor fired off three plasma bolts at Stronghold.

Stronghold, after he missed or hit Ptro, was hit and knocked out of flames
way...
